description:
code of the illumination and image mode of a liquid crystal display.
The mode in which the relevant data are made visible, viz:|  Reflective:   ambient light reflected by a diffuse reflector in the LCD.|Transmissive:   display lit from behind by an artificial light source.|Transflective:   combination of both above.|Positive:   image is black and remaining display area is grey when ON.|Negative:   image is grey and remaining display area is black when ON.
